Gather an overview of what Java is and i.title: The Evolution of Java: A Historical Perspective
Gather an overview of what Java is and i.summary: Java is a general-purpose, object-oriented, platform-independent, and high-performance language that can run on any device that supports a Java virtual machine (JVM).
key_points: Developed by James Gosling and a team of engineers at Sun Microsystems in 1991 as part of the 'Green' project.
Initially designed for consumer electronic devices, such as smart TVs, set-top boxes, and handheld controllers.
The goal was to create a language that was simple, robust, portable, and secure.

Gather an overview of what Java is and i.title: History Of Java | Complete Timeline + Infographic & ...
Gather an overview of what Java is and i.summary: Java was created by James Gosling and his team at Sun Microsystems in 1991. It was originally developed for interactive television and embedded systems under the Green Project but later repurposed for web and enterprise applications.
key_points: The original name of Java was 'Oak', inspired by an oak tree outside the office of the development team.
The name was later changed to Java in 1995 because Oak had already been trademarked by a company called Oak Technology.
Java is known for its platform independence and robust ecosystem.

Gather an overview of what Java is and i.title: Java (programming language) - Wikipedia
Gather an overview of what Java is and i.summary: Java is a high-level, general-purpose, memory-safe, object-oriented programming language that provides write once, run anywhere (WORA) functionality.
key_points: The syntax of Java is similar to C and C++, but has fewer low-level facilities.
Java applications are typically compiled to bytecode that can run on any Java virtual machine (JVM).
Java was first publicly released in 1996 as Java 1.0.

Gather an overview of what Java is and i.title: The Complete History of Java Programming Language
Gather an overview of what Java is and i.summary: Java was developed by James Gosling and his team at Sun Microsystems in the early 1990s as a platform independent language for embedded devices.
key_points: The team initially explored C++ but found it to be too heavy and too closely tied to platform dependencies.
The Java Class Library expanded from a few hundred classes to thousands over the years.
Java has undergone continual revision via the Java Community Process (JCP) since its first public release in 1996.

Gather an overview of what Java is and i.title: History of Java: evolution, legal battles with Microsoft, Mars ...
Gather an overview of what Java is and i.summary: Java's history spans from its inception to conquering the Red Planet, with essential tools every Java developer relies on.
key_points: The Java programming language project was launched in 1991 at Sun Microsystems by engineers James Gosling, Mike Sheridan, and Patrick Naughton.
The primary goal was to create a universal language capable of running on diverse electronic devices.
Java was used for software development at NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL) for commanding and controlling the Mars Sojourner rover in 1995.
